long_description: The CamelBak Quick Grip(TM) water bottle keeps your water cool and close at hand when you're training hard. Includes a 21 fl. oz. Podium Chill insulated bottle to keep your beverages cool for hours in warm weather. Podium bottle features the self-sealing JetValve(TM) cap that eliminate drips; JetValve cap lets you sip from any direction or squirt to cool off on a hot day. Slip your hand into the Quick Grip(TM) water bottle carrier for convenient access to your water; hand strap is adjustable to fit most hand sizes. Small zippered pocket holds your house key, some cash and an energy gel packet; includes a key clip. CamelBak Quick Grip(TM) has reflective tape to increase your visibility at night. Polypropylene bottle is 100% BPA free.
short_description: The CamelBak Quick Grip(TM) water bottle keeps your water cool and close at hand when you're training hard.
